title: The FDA wants to rein in drug ads. On Super Bowl Sunday, it will be business as usual
description: On Super Bowl Sunday, the drug industry is trotting out lounging football stars, a shouting DJ Khaled, and the soothing tones of Enya.
content: On Super Bowl Sunday, the drug industry is trotting out lounging football stars, a shouting DJ Khaled, and the soothing tones of Enya.
